original_text: Then the Devil left Jesus alone. Immediately angels came to Jesus and they took care of him.
korean_text: 이에 마귀는 예수를 떠나고 천사들이 나아와서 수종드니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Devil left Jesus alone
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 악마는 예수님을 혼자 두고 떠났습니다

sentences.original_text: and they took care of him
